OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: This IP is used to handle Multiple Product relation actions like linking & unlink products, Move Assets to quote, or Remove assets from the quote.
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: ESMProductRelationActions

childElements.name: AddAssetsToQuote
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "accountId" : "%SetValues:accountId%", "assetIdList" : "%getAllChildAssetIds:assetIds%", "isAssetsFromMultiAccount" : true, "listTypeAsset" : "all", "quoteId" : "%SetValues:cartId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "ISNOTBLANK(%SetValues:AssetIds%)", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction1", "remoteClass" : "OmniChangeToQuoteWrapper", "remoteMethod" : "changeToQuote", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }
